title: Can't log in
body: I am trying to fuckingg log in but I can't  it only says authenticating? can someone help me?

replies.body: same over here man...somebody respond pls???{{champion:115}}
Need help tho, tf is going on, its been 3 days can't log in. Stuck on authenticating

I would love to help you out and the rest of you that see this! So when your client is Authenticating it means that there is usually a bad connection to our Server. If you run through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) though it should fix your authenticating issue and get you back in the game :)
Just download tunnelbear,connect to  US and then start client,log in then shut down tunnelbear.worked for me.
I have same problem and nobody answer???
